label: AB2_hP24_194_ef_fgh-001
title: MgNi$_{2}$ Hexagonal Laves ($C36$) Structure
comments: An AFLOW user, Mehdi Noori, identified an inconsistency with this entry and the original reference (Mehl, 2017): the z-value for Mg (I) 4e should have been 0.09400, not 0.04598. This entry has been corrected.
